name: Cherryblossom cuddle doll, 12 ", waldorf doll, organic doll, first doll, pure natural doll
description:
A one-of-a-kind organic doll for the little ones.
Made of pure organic materials like new carded pure sheep wool, bio fabrics, mohair.
A cuddle doll for life!

She will be a compagnion through childhood, helps to fall asleep, comforts, laughs, is best friend, keeps secrets.

Cherry blossom is made rose bio nicky ( Westfalenstoffe), Tricot from Switzerland, Mohair, sheep wool, wearing a grey tunic with red cherries.

She can take a bath if necessary and is for children 1+.

The decoration is not part of the offer 

belambolo.blogspot.com
http:// www.facebook.com/Belambolo Dolls

name: handmade doll girl "Linnea" from belambolo - 40cm / 16 "
description:
innea is 40 cm / 16" tall, her hair is in a beautiful blond colour, her eyes are blue and the face is embroidered.
Linnea has a lot of cheeky freckles .
She wants to do same gardening, plant flowers and watch the birds building their nest.

She is wearing

-a purple leggings/ panties
- a white undershirt
- a blue flowered pinafore dress
- red and white striped stockings
- rose crochet shoes
- a green handknitted cardigan

Linnea is a handcrafted doll according to waldorf pedagogy.
She is 40 cm / 16 inches tall and made with a high quality cotton interlock tricot from Switzerland. Linnea is completely stitched by hand, her clothes are made from natural materials such as mohair, cotton jersey, wool and her body ist filled with sheep wool. 

Linnea is more appropriate for a child 4+, that can dress or undress the doll without help. She can be gently handwashed, the clothes too.


Every doll can be individualized according to their wishes. Please contact me

Please visit my shop at belambolo.etsy.com or my blog belambolo.blogspot.com

I also like to fulfill individual customer requirements!

name: Pattern for knitted doll dress Jehona, doll dress pattern, knitting for dolls
description:
This cosy dress can be worn as a sweet summer dress or over a longsleeved shirt as a tunic. Easy to knit- also for beginners.

The measurements in the pattern are for dolls with a height of 12 inch - 14 inch. Depending on the size of the doll, the models can also be easily customized.

**After payment is completed, you will receive an e-mail notification letting you know the pattern in English language is ready on the download page**

This pattern ist available in german and english.
Please contact me info [!at] belambolo.de for the german pattern.



belambolo.blogspot.com
info [!at] belambolo.de

name: Sewing tutorial and pattern for doll tunic LOTTE - belambolo, doll clothes, sewing doll clothes
description:
A sweet and simple instruction for a doll tunic ( dollboys or girls, depending on the fabric you use)
By the simple average, the model is well suited even for beginners. 

The guide is richly illustrated and describes step by step how you need to proceed.

Suitable for beginners and advanced students.

After payment is completed, you will receive an automatic e-mail notification letting you know the download is ready on the download page.
